duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide day-to-day supervision of engineering staff’s activities and hands-on training to the current staff.
Run daily shift change meetings, provide direction for each staff member, and ensure timely completion of maintenance work orders.
Preside at weekly scheduling meetings and reconcile maintenance requirements to meet facility needs.
Use building systems to maximize technology and provide cost savings initiatives for review and approval.
Ensure environmental policy adherence, safety, and comfort of tenants while reducing tenant work orders.
Follow up with customers to ensure service requests are completed, schedule preventative maintenance, and ensure compliance with procurement programs.
Assist in reviewing and engineering plans for additional maintenance, construction, and renovations and maintain a safe facility.
Oversee various construction projects and confirm compliance with building standards and codes.

education_certification.credential: Three to five years of Facility Management experience in a high-rise building preferred. Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Proficient in computer usage. Prior supervisory/management experience.
